document.full_text: a federal appeals court upheld a ruling that echostar corp infringed tivo inc patents for digital recording technology, raising hopes the long legal battle could end with a tivo victory.
document.title: court upholds echostar contempt filing, tivo up
lines_and_colors: a federal appeals court upheld a ruling that echostar corp infringed tivo inc patents for digital recording technology, raising hopes the long legal battle could end with a tivo victory.
